languages.text: {n}Капитан с готовностью кивает.{/n} "Есть! Мы усилим давление на ненадежные элементы — проведем обыски, дознания и выявим преступников. Чернь загоним на молебны и напомним им, что закон Вашей Светлости суров".

traits.locale_text: {n}Капитан с готовностью кивает.{/n} "Есть! Мы усилим давление на ненадежные элементы — проведем обыски, дознания и выявим преступников. Чернь загоним на молебны и напомним им, что закон Вашей Светлости суров".

languages.text: {n}The captain nods eagerly.{/n} "Will do! We will increase the pressure on the untrustworthy element, conduct searches and interrogations to uncover criminals. We will herd the rabble to prayer services and remind them that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s law is a stern one."
languages.original_text: {n}Капитан с готовностью кивает.{/n} "Есть! Мы усилим давление на ненадежные элементы — проведем обыски, дознания и выявим преступников. Чернь загоним на молебны и напомним им, что закон Вашей Светлости суров".

{n}The captain nods eagerly.{/n} "Will do! We'll increase the pressure on the untrustworthy element! We'll conduct searches and investigations to uncover thieves and criminals! We'll herd the rabble to prayer services and remind them that Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's law is a stern one."

languages.text: {n}Der Captain nickt eifrig.{/n} "Wird gemacht! Wir werden den Druck auf dieses unzuverlässige Gesindel erhöhen und Durchsuchungen und Verhöre durchführen, um kriminelle Elemente aufzuspüren. Wir werden das Pack zu Gebeten zerren und daran erinnern, dass die Gesetze Eurer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft streng sind."
languages.original_text: {n}The captain nods eagerly.{/n} "Will do! We will increase the pressure on the untrustworthy element, conduct searches and interrogations to uncover criminals. We will herd the rabble to prayer services and remind them that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s law is a stern one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Captain nickt eifrig.{/n} "Wird gemacht! Wir werden den Druck auf dieses unzuverlässige Gesindel erhöhen und Durchsuchungen und Verhöre durchführen, um kriminelle Elemente aufzuspüren. Wir werden das Pack zu Gebeten zerren und daran erinnern, dass die Gesetze Eurer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft streng sind."

languages.text: {n}Le capitaine acquiesce avec enthousiasme.{/n} « Certainement ! Nous allons mettre la pression sur les éléments indignes de confiance, mener des fouilles et des interrogatoires pour démasquer les criminels. Nous allons forcer la populace à participer aux offices religieux pour lui rappeler que la loi de Votre Seigneurie est sévère. »
languages.original_text: {n}The captain nods eagerly.{/n} "Will do! We will increase the pressure on the untrustworthy element, conduct searches and interrogations to uncover criminals. We will herd the rabble to prayer services and remind them that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s law is a stern one."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le capitaine acquiesce avec enthousiasme.{/n} « Certainement ! Nous allons mettre la pression sur les éléments indignes de confiance, mener des fouilles et des interrogatoires pour démasquer les criminels. Nous allons forcer la populace à participer aux offices religieux pour lui rappeler que la loi de Votre Seigneurie est sévère. »

languages.text: {n}El capitán asiente con vehemencia.{/n} «¡Así se hará! ¡Ejerceremos más presión sobre los elementos más sediciosos y llevaremos a cabo registros e interrogatorios para desenmascarar a los criminales! Obligaremos a la plebe a asistir a los servicios religiosos y les recordaremos que, en la nave de su {mf|señor|señora}, la ley se cumple a rajatabla».
languages.original_text: {n}The captain nods eagerly.{/n} "Will do! We will increase the pressure on the untrustworthy element, conduct searches and interrogations to uncover criminals. We will herd the rabble to prayer services and remind them that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s law is a stern one."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capitán asiente con vehemencia.{/n} «¡Así se hará! ¡Ejerceremos más presión sobre los elementos más sediciosos y llevaremos a cabo registros e interrogatorios para desenmascarar a los criminales! Obligaremos a la plebe a asistir a los servicios religiosos y les recordaremos que, en la nave de su {mf|señor|señora}, la ley se cumple a rajatabla».

languages.text: {n}中隊長は、しきりにうなずいている。{/n}「そうします！信用のおけない連中への圧力を強めます！泥棒や犯罪者を摘発するために、操作や取り調べを行います！大衆を礼拝へと連行し、陛下の掟が厳しいものであることを思い知らせましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The captain nods eagerly.{/n} "Will do! We will increase the pressure on the untrustworthy element, conduct searches and interrogations to uncover criminals. We will herd the rabble to prayer services and remind them that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s law is a stern one."

traits.locale_text: {n}中隊長は、しきりにうなずいている。{/n}「そうします！信用のおけない連中への圧力を強めます！泥棒や犯罪者を摘発するために、操作や取り調べを行います！大衆を礼拝へと連行し、陛下の掟が厳しいものであることを思い知らせましょう」

languages.text: {n}上尉急切地点着头。{/n}“遵命，大人！我们会加大对不良分子的执法力度！我们会执行严格搜查，揪出所有罪犯。我们会带领这些乌合之众进行礼拜，提醒他们您的律法有多严厉。”
languages.original_text: {n}The captain nods eagerly.{/n} "Will do! We will increase the pressure on the untrustworthy element, conduct searches and interrogations to uncover criminals. We will herd the rabble to prayer services and remind them that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s law is a stern one."

traits.locale_text: {n}上尉急切地点着头。{/n}“遵命，大人！我们会加大对不良分子的执法力度！我们会执行严格搜查，揪出所有罪犯。我们会带领这些乌合之众进行礼拜，提醒他们您的律法有多严厉。”

languages.text: {n}Komutan, şevkle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Başüstüne! Suçluları açığa çıkarmak için güven uyandırmayanlar üzerindeki baskımızı artıracağız. Araştırma ve sorgular icra edeceğiz. Ayaktakımını kutsal ayinlere yönlendireceğiz ve onlara {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin kanunlarının ne kadar sert olduğunu hatırlatacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}The captain nods eagerly.{/n} "Will do! We will increase the pressure on the untrustworthy element, conduct searches and interrogations to uncover criminals. We will herd the rabble to prayer services and remind them that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s law is a stern one."
